description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. You've got the ultimate racing car, and an unlimited road to drive on. What else do we need to say? It's all about driving. Fast. No brakes, no limits. This high-speed racing indie game has been developed by Milkstone Studios.
